description: Associates a resource with an application. The resource can be specified by its ARN or name. The application can be specified by ARN, ID, or name. You must have the following permissions to associate a resource using the OPTIONS parameter set to APPLY_APPLICATION_TAG. You must also have these additional permissions if you don't use the AWSServiceCatalogAppRegistryFullAccess policy. For more information, see AWSServiceCatalogAppRegistryFullAccess in the AppRegistry Administrator Guide.

parameters.name: application
parameters.description: The name, ID, or ARN of the application.

parameters.name: resourceType
parameters.description: The type of resource of which the application will be associated.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: The name or ID of the resource of which the application will be associated.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Determines whether an application tag is applied or skipped. (string) ---

nested_items.name: applicationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon resource name (ARN) of the application that was augmented with attributes.

nested_items.name: resourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon resource name (ARN) that specifies the resource.

nested_items.name: options
nested_items.description: Determines whether an application tag is applied or skipped.
